text: Þis his þa landes boc æt Stantune.
Þis his sio land seten æt Stantune þe Cenwold hafede.
Aerest on holan wylle þonne from holan wille on holan weg midde weardne ðonne þonan on þrifing dene & ðonne of ðryfing dene on sceobban stan.
Ðonne of blacan graue on gemerstan ðonne of merstane on gemer beorgas ðonne on longan dene netðe wearde to anan stane.

Ðæt to þare eorðbyrig ðonne þonan to axna mere midde weardne ðonne þonan on lytlan beorg to anan stane ðonne þonan to eas more to þare burgilsan ðonne þonan to brom lace ðonne andlang broces æt eddes ford ðonne eft from eddes forda up weard andlang broces ðæt eft to holan wylle.
